EmailTemplate.name: Detailed Invoice has changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Detailed Invoice? has been changed on {!Contract.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contract.CSM__c} ,
Detailed Invoice? has been updated by {!Contract.LastModifiedBy} at {!Contract.LastModifiedDate}.
If you feel these changes are incorrect please contact the Salesforce user who made the change. This is an automated message, please do not reply.
